abstract: Carl C. Icahn and other shareholders in Enzon Pharmaceuticals got their wish Monday, when the company said it would try to sell all or part of its commercial business, which includes four marketed drugs, royalties from third-party products and a manufacturing plant in Indiana.

lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn and other shareholders in Enzon Pharmaceuticals got their wish Monday, when the company said it would try to sell all or part of its commercial business, which includes four marketed drugs, royalties from third-party products and a manufacturing plant in Indiana.

headline.main: Under Pressure, Enzon Puts Commercial Unit Up for Sale
